ticket.title: Calling an undefined method in a controller doesn't raise an error
ticket.original-body:
When calling an undefined method on a controller class, no error is raised. The routes just stop working.
For example:
@@@ ruby class ApplicationController < ActionController::Base test123 end @@@
Or:
@@@ ruby class PeopleController < ApplicationController test123 end @@@
These does not raise a NoMethodFound exception and the log just says "ActionController::RoutingError (No route matches "/people")". The route does exist in routes.rb of course... I'm running Ruby 1.9.1.
